reviews.review_msg: Awesome 4th year course. She's smart, hot and funny. Organized course. Wants you to succeed.

This is the type of professor students look for in fourth year. Easy going, no textbook, good feedback. Yes, this class required some practice, but this professor replied to EVERY single email. Even the one sent to her a night before the final at 10 PM. She takes the final in the 10th /11th week, and the rest is presentations.  CLASS ENDS EARLY!

400 level course, her teaching style is 180 degree different from Buec333. In 425 class she goes over concept/definitions only, no numerical examples. Gives difficult practice problems b4 midterm/final and must work on it with your classmates, o/w, near impossible to do/understand. Must ask for help at office hr! Individual presentation was decent.
